content.detailedDescription: I was walking at rock mountain lake park in denver. i had walked a couple of miles and decided to rest on a bench for a minute, which is not something i usually do. i looked up at the sky and saw a very bright sphere shaped object high in the sky. it seemed to be going higher instead in a typical direction. i saw two planes in the air, one headed east and the other west. this was not a plane or helicopter. i observed it for a few minutes and it vanished. when i first saw it i did not believe what i was seeing, because this was my second sighting. i also know for a fact, i was meant to see it, just like the first one i saw. it felt normal to see it.
content.summary: Was resting on a park bench after walking, looked up and saw very bright glowing object high in the northeastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette on the west side of my home when i noticed a strange, bright light to the west.  at first i thought it may be just an airplane with landing lights on, but then why would an airplane have landing lights nowhere near an airport? as this thought crossed my mind, i noticed that the lights started getting brighter and closer.  once i really, truly knew this wasn't a plane or helicopter (or anything else ive ever seen) the lights started coming towards me even faster.  after just a few seconds the bright white lights were directly next to my house and i could then see the object itself.  it abruptly slowed to a crawl almost and flew silently directly over my head and house.  it was shaped almost like a chevron. triangular in the front,with another section in the back, instead of 2 points it was a straight line across the back...Kind of like a child would draw a house.  the lights were not on the front of the craft but towards the center of it. i believe there were 4 lights across the middle, and they seemed to be housed in some sort of...Cockpit, i guess i would call it.  the craft looked metallic, dark gray or black and very solid.  i didn't notice any seams in the metal...Just a solid sheet of something.  as it flew right over my head, i could see the entire craft from front to back.  once it was nearly past my head, it started speeding up and i had to run to the front (north) of the house to see it.  in the few seconds it took for me to run under the carport, it had sped up & started heading south.  i watched as it zoomed away, faster than anything i've ever seen.  
i was simply curious when i first noticed the lights, but as it was directly over my head & it seemed as if i could almost reach up & touch it i did feel quite anxious and nervous...My heart was racing and i think i stopped breathing!  after it was out of site and i realized what had really just happened, i was still excited and shaking but had to tell everyone in the house about it!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange craft flew directly over my house

content.detailedDescription: Last night sunday morning around 2 pm i was going to go to sleep when i looked out my back door i saw a light in the sky that to me looked liked jupitor rising in the east sky, after looking through my binoculars at this object somrthing did not add up so i got out my cannon 30d with a zoom lens...100 to 400 1,4 -5.56 lens and then i saw what i was looking has not earthly origin
content.shape: Blimp,   Cone,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Something in the sky that looks  like a planet with the naked but it is not a star either

content.detailedDescription: Tonight at about 9:20 pm i was driving home from my job in downtown la on the 110 freeway heading north. while driving i saw bright lights behind a large building and half of an object hovering. intrigued, i watched it while trying to drive safe until i drove far enough to see the entire ufo. it was disk shaped with white lights circling a disk shaped object and a light in the top, center of it. it could not have been a plane or blimp because it was extremely low and close to one of the large downtown buildings and it made no noise. i was able to keep an eye on and follow the object for about a full minute or 2 (it's hard to recall time during such a shocking experence but i had a good clear look for a well amount of time). i think it was approximately the size of a massive airplane, the kind that can hold hundreds of passengers. as i drove along it flew in a pretty solid path into the distance, away from the downtown area. unfortunately, i lost sight of it while going under tunnels merging onto the 5 n freeway. by the time i lost sight of it by changing freeways, it had made its way pretty far off into the distance in a short amount of time, basically it had to have been moving really fast. this was a pretty intense experience. i was in shock, questioning my sanity and sight, trying to rule out what it could have been, shaking like a leaf, sweaty, and pretty much in pure shock/excitement while trying not to crash on such a hectic freeway. i'm sure hundreds of other people had to have witnessed it and i can not wait to hear of another witnesses experience that validates mine. i'm still pretty shaken up and keep replaying the experience in my head. because i had a great view of it for so long i kept thinking about trying to take a picture, but because i was driving, scrambling through my purse in a shocked state did not seem like a good idea.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Downtown los angeles disk shaped ufo with lights seen off 110 freeway

content.detailedDescription: While fishing me and my 2 friends saw 3 lights moving northwest in a triangle formation twice with no sound whatsoever
content.summary: 3 bright white star like lights moving northwest two separate times

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking out of my house not too long ago to go take my dog outside,i looked at the buildings southeast of my apartments an saw a huge orangeish/reddish orb hovering in place.Its altitude looked very low,hovering maybe only 300-400 feet off ground.I have never seen something so bright an something in the sky hovering that low.I watched it only for about 2 mins or so,then out of no where it was gone,the object didnt look to move or anything when it vanished,it just disappeared.
  i thought this was very out of this world,the huge size didnt really surprise me much,but it was how bright it was,i have never seen something so bright but yet not light up the sky or ground.The lighting had no affect on any surfaces,i could see as the building roof top was competly dark,an this object was not very far behind the buildings.
content.summary: A large orange reddish orb hovering over buildings for a short amount of time

content.detailedDescription:
for no apparent reason i wake up around 4 am in my bed upstairs. i begin to admire how bright the stars look through my balcony door window when i notice one of the stars is not acting like the others. this star appears to be swaying and moving abnormally. i line up the star-like object with my wall and notice the star is indeed swaying toward and away from the wall very strange like. therefore, i decide to capture this moment with my hand held camcorder when i notice a whole new perspective. viewing this object through my camera, it appears to be moving much more dramatic and forming different colors (such as the red/blue shift). at first, i thought it was my shaky hand causing the erratic motions.  however, the next day i look more closely at the footage and notice when the object stops moving erratically three balls of light form revolving very tightly in a sphere pattern then back into a single ball of light. my first impression was that these balls of light was trying to communicate in some foreign language by displaying these foreign characters resembling that of our own arabic language. or perhaps it was simply my shaky shooting that caused all these interesting character looking shapes. 
    several months pass and nobody else has seen this swaying star in the sky, not even the astronomers to my knowledge. however, july 4th 2010, a young boy sitting just behind me with his father awaiting the fireworks says these words..."daddy, that star is moving.." i immediately turn around and say "finally! someone else is witnessing what i have seen." goosebumps on my arms appear as i locate the same "star" this little boy saw and now i'm starting to think something is not right. now i feel obligated to share this with people other than my family, so i call in to bobby bones show 96.7 fm a local morning show days later and reveal to them what i have on tape. however, they did not seem to be thrilled about it at all. moreover, in my opinion, my footage wasn't/isn't convincing enough to get too excited about. which is why i am here contacting you guys several months after the fact because i need some professional help debunking my footage. who knows, maybe i do have something here!


best regards,

grant dolenz
content.summary: Star-like object in southern skies always at night. seems to be mocking astrological positioned star. 25-45 degrees above horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Im not sure of the exact year, i was very young. i was about 6 or 7. i lived in the city of erie, pa. it was in a residential neighborhood in the middle of the city. multiple people in my neighborhood saw it. i dont remember waking up to come out on the porch to see it, i also dont remember going to sleep afterwards. it was huge in size. approx. 300 yards long and 100 yards high. with multiple lights seemingly scattered randomly across the craft. i beleive it hovered for 10 minutes or so about 100 ft off the ground. it was totally silent. my mother also witnessed it. i'm pretty sure our paper ran a story on it a few days after.
content.summary: Giant ufo seen in erie, pa very close to ground

content.detailedDescription: Driving along country road near christmas village in pennsylvania (not far from bernville, pa).  saw a spinning, swirling, mirage-like anomaly (like when you see heat coming off a grill, or heat shimmering above the road when it's hot outside).  it was off to the side of the road at the edge of a field, spinning very fast and suddenly just shot out of sight at a very high rate of speed.  it looked to be about the height of a person and was a few feet off the ground.  people who saw it were inside their car with closed windows so if it made any noise they didn't hear it.  at first no one said anything and then after it went away and they were driving along, the driver and passenger said to each other, "what the heck was that?".  there was no explanation for it it wasn't raining, snowing, windy or anything else; the object/anomaly simple appeared there off to the side of the road and then spun away into the sky at a very high rate of speed, and the driver of the car said she will not drive there anymore because she was scared by something that couldn't be explained.  the two people who saw it said they have never seen anything like it and it was completely outside their frame of reference as a normal occurrence.
content.summary: Looked like heat mirage, spinning fast, misty, fast

content.detailedDescription:
As called into asd at 12:46 pm today by the witness who wishes to remain anonymous.  he would not provide contact information due to his job in kc government. 

"my wife and i were getting in the car on our way to lunch today when my neighbor pointed to the sky to our north and said "look at that!" we looked in that direction and all three of us saw a large gray metallic disc-shaped object with low dome on it. it was hoovering at first, then started moving slowly in a north direction.  it disspeared for a couple of seconds, then reapeared further away. we saw no lights or windows and heard absolutely no sound.  there was a small private airplane in the area and he must have seen this object because he flew right over the spot where it was as it moved away!  i don't know what the altitude was but i'd guess 1,000 - 2,000 feet - it was pretty low.  my best guess for the size of the thing is 3 - 5 miles across! none of us could believe what we saw. this is the first time my wife and i have seen a ufo and we are stunned.  we decided to call someone but don't want any publicity or anyone else to know who we are. my job is too sensitive and i can't risk putting my name out there.  i called to see if anyone else saw this - someone else must have seen it! we watched it for about three minutes total time, then lost sight of it behind the trees.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very large disc ufo over kansas city, missouri in daylight

content.detailedDescription:
The following event happened when we lived on kaer avenue, red bluff, ca and i was just leaving grade school for high school.  

  this occurred about 1960.  i was around 15 years old (i am now 66)and my mother and i were in the house.  mom was probably fixing supper and i was more than likely watching tv.

  my father came into the house and told my mother and i to come outside and look at something unusual in the western sky.  we followed dad out the front door and into the street on the south side of the house.  we observed a basketball size object (reddish orange) hovering in the western sky.

  (note:  it was not the moon, as the moon was in the eastern sky just where it should be, with its man in the moon shape, etc.)  i had no idea what is was, and my father who was a wwii veteran was completely stumped.

  this is where it gets weird.  the object did not move up or down, left or right, but hovered in exactly the same spot.  then it just disappeared about 7:30pm.  we talked about it the rest of the night.
the next day my dad came in and said it was back.  sure enough, at just after 7:00pm it was exactly where it had been the evening before.  same exact place.  my dad called a several neighbors who came over and i remember them getting into all kinds of theories as to what is was.  then they observed that if you walked down the street, (heading south) about 50 yards, it disappeared and when you backed up a couple steps is came back into view.  the same thing happened if you walked up the street (heading north).  we found this out because some of our neighbors could not see it as they walked toward our house, and then it appeared suddenly and if they backed up it would disappear.  there was only about a 100 to 150 foot area (window) that it could be seen.

this event took place for 5 nights, and then stopped.  the time for each event turned out to be from 7:00pm to 7:30pm.  i do remember that on the last night, our driveway was full of law enforcement vehicles and even a couple of national guard rigs, and a ton of people from around the neighborhood and from town (red bluff, ca). 
our neighbor across the street, mr. mckay the red bluff high school science teacher was completely stumped.  on the third night he called some of his colleagues from a university in california and they were there on the fourth and fifth nights of the sighting.  some had gadgets to measure light, and heat, and size.  other gadgets i do not know their purpose.  i do recall them being very confused as to why the object would disappear when walking north and south and even when walking away from and toward it.  this was truely an unusual event.

extra notes:

size:    the size and shape was the same as a basketball that was only about 10 feet from you.  very large.  and if looking at a basketball only 10 feet away it appeared to be about 8 to 9 feet off the ground.  that will give you an idea of the angle from my view point as i was only 5'6 back then.

distance:    unknown.  it did not get any larger even when looking through binoculars.  it stayed the same size, and no other features were visible either.  the color always stayed the same.


duration:    only 30 minutes of viewing each night.  from 7pm to 730pm each evening for 5 nights.  was it there the night before my father noticed it the first time.  we do not know, it could have been.  it never came back again, and i spent days, months, and even years looking west from our house for its return.


i know that it's been many years since the event, but i have to know if others have seen a similar thing hovering in the evening sky.  (remember, it was not the moon, a star, street light, car headlights, house light, flashlight, lantern, jack-o-lantern, etc.  they could not tell us what is was then, maybe you can now.
i am sorry there are no photos.  i recall (or think i recall) someone saying that none of the photos would come out or develop.  there was just nothing there, only the western evening sky would show.  


ps:  it was your television show that made me write this.  

ok, mufon, tell me what it was, or was not as the case my be.

do you contact us (or me)or do i stay in limbo for another 66 years.


thank you
james

please call me......  this is driving me nuts.
content.summary: Object appeared 4 evenings in a row, just hovered in place, and could not be seen from different view points.

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog out to do his business, when i looked up and noticed a bright light, (i thought it was just a very bright star that i had never seen before). as i watched it changed from the one bright light to several oblong shaped outer lights. it then proceeded to move due east toward the mountains. as it got close to the rincon mountains it turned 90 degrees (from flat to sideways is the only way i can explain it). it paused for a few seconds and then took off straight up. what was odd is that it only moved maybe a quarter mile up and disappeared, like turning on a cloking device. i know that sounds funny, but that's what it looked like. i would have loved to take a photo of the object, but i was just standing there frozen and could not move to get the camera.

you may call me if you like. i would like to discuss two other events that occured in april 08, and one in august 09 which i have attached a note.
content.summary: This is my third encounter with these crafts. i have always been affraid that i would not be taken serious. i know what i saw and would take a lie detector test to prove it.

content.detailedDescription: Never heard of mufon, wish i did at the time.  i've always wondered ever since what i witnessed. i'm sure this happened too long ago for someone else to collaborate, but i'd sure like to know if anyone else ever saw anything like this, since i've never heard of an occurance of this type.  here's what happened at least 15 years ago.  for sure, it was the night before halloween - so it was october 31st.  i had an astronomy book and was going from inside to read the sky position on my skychart, to outside in the dark to see if i could find the galaxy andramada with my 20 power binoculars.  (too powerful in this case.) it was somewhere around 8 pm to 10 pm.  the sky was very clear.  i was facing east/north east holding my binoculars.  i noticed movement to my right.  i looked over to my right to see what i at first thought was a jet, not oncommon around selfridge airforce base, but uncommon in the direction it was going which was almost exactly from west to east.  but there were no lights on it at all. it was dull grey.  the size would have been correct for the jets we usually see going in a different direction to selfridge before landing. then i noticed that there was no noise for what appeared to be a big jet. so looking more closely, i was surprised that i could see spaces between 5 objects, possibly egg or oval shaped in a v formation.  then my first thought was i was watching canada geese, which i quickly found out was incorrect - because there was no flapping or wing movement which i would have seen from the size of the objects. the movement was absolutely smooth and quiet. at the same time, i was shocked to see some reflections going past the underside of these dark objects. now i'm excited because this is something totally unknown to my senses.  i'm holding 20 power binoculars in my hand, and the objects are now over the lake and getting darker since there are no lights over the lake.  (if you've ever had 20 power binoculars, you know that you are looking into a very narrow field of view.  if i want to see a jet airliner in the sky without a contrail, it's close to impossible to hone in on it with hand held 20 power binocs, if you can, it will take a lot of time, and holding still is impossible.) so i remember thinking to myself, they're going out of sight soon, i have to either keep looking with my eyes, or try to get lucky with the binocs.  with the binocs, i would see exactly what at least one of them was.  i went for it, lifting the binoculars frantically trying to find waht was up there - to no avail!  i took a chance, and lost.  they were out of sight, over the lake.  this whole scenario took probably less than 20 seconds.  the next day, i thought of calling the radar station at the detroit airport, but decided not to.  i figured from what i have heard, selfridge wouldn't report anything anyways.  i'm sure this is a usless bit of info here, but if you do have time, let me know if anyone else has ever reporte anything remotely like this.   thanks for your time.
content.summary: Thought at 1st it was a low jet, then noticed spaces between parts, then thought  geese, but no flapping

content.detailedDescription: Its may 25th 2011, my schools graduation im a senior in highschool and i have just graduated my last year as a highschool student, im excited for our sober grad night and i am waiting in our schools cafeteria. the people in the cafeteria had told me i didnt need to be back for the bus for sober grad night until 10:45 so i decided to call my mom to pick me up as im walking out to meet her at the front gate my cousin,(anonymous) sees me ands like hey dude congrats wanna go get a starbucks or something? i said sure man lets go lemme just go tell my mom, so my mom gets here and i go tell her hey sorry for making you drive here(we live around the corner from the schoolish area) and i say im going with lets call him jim, i said me and jim are gonna go get coffee, she said alright and i get in the car with jim and his friend shes a girl well call her michelle, michelle is driving id say about a 2000 camry with a sunroof, nothing special just a typical average car, we start driving to starbucks which is about a half mile away from the school walking distance easily. as we pull out of the parking lot and get on the main road which is located directly next to the side of the school thats when me and jim see it, michelle driving and paying attention to the road and singing to the radio did not see the ufo unfortunately, but anyways so were on the road and what i see next has affected me to this day, i see this teal donut disc shaped object about id say 200-300feet in the air and about 50-100 feet infront of us, i was sitting in the back seat and i happened to lean forward and when i leaned forward i looked through the sunroof and it was at the exact instant that i looked up that i saw the object come from what appeared to be a wall in the middle of the sky, meaning it had a 90degree straight edge behind it, i dunno how to explain it but it looked as if it just came from behind a black sheet or from what i still fail to admit but another dimension is what it looked like, the object came into full view about id say a half second later it appeared like it came from behind whatever a lil slower than shot out like a speeding bullet traveling as fast as the black jets i see everywhere, its going at a slightly diagonal angle and is moving extremely fast next thing i know its gets to the tops of these houses on the other side of the road and than it picks up speed astonishingly fast, and i mean it was to a point that the whole thing had brought tears to my eyes about how unreal it was, i couldnt believe what i had just witnissed me and jim were both shaking and yelling what in the fuck was that? over nd over again, when it had picked up speed however to what i swear on my life had to be lightspeed, because it had left a 15-20 foot lightstreak behind it that was very bright and disipated out of the air rather quickly, all i know is that the fact that it came from behind the wall has affected me greatly since, i remember feeling as if when i was staring at it in the beginning when it was coming from the wall that it was communicating with me, because since that day ive gotten this strange veryyyy strange deja vu that baffles me to a point of depression,you know how normal deja vu hits ya and its like woah deja vu, mine was like woah deja vu at first but than it stayed, and would last up to a an hour and i felt like in a way i had seen all of what was goin on already or before i guess, its hard to say that with out sounding crazy i know but i mean im a health 18 year old kid who played football for to years, taken photography classes my whole life and extremely passionate about not lying, its the worse thing anyone can do especially about a subject like this is lie about an experience, so when i tell you this deja vu is still occurring on a daily basis, its by far the weirdest thing ive ever experienced, on another note id also like to say that before this i was skeptical but open minded about ufos i was in the mindset of yeh they prolly exist but all the youtube videos of ufos are basically all the same sketchy footage blurry shaky and bad quality, than i thought after months of trying to look up anything similar to what i saw with no luck that 90% of the videos are fakes, cause at this point after researching so many videos and information about it, its to a point where if i would have gotten this on tape it would be on world news right now. end of story. i know for a fact that this object a lone on film would have had to make the president make a public adress about some bullshit about what it is or to just tell the truth cause what i saw, there is not a single possibility it was from this earth. period i will stick to that statement until i die, i can account for strange happenings besides the deja vu as well after the incident has occured i have no idea if it indeed has any relation to the ufo but 3 days after the event me and a couple friends decide to go see hangover 2 this is the first time i can account for the deja vu,during the movie i got a weird stomach ache and kept telling them i wanted to leave because i had felt like i had already seen it, all the scenes playing were like i had already seen them heard the lines everything it was paranormal in  a way , i tough it out and sit through the movie emotionless because i cant even enjoy the movie the deja vu is so bad, when we leave im sitting in the back seat and its my friend and his brother up front, were driving back to his house and we go under this underpass sorta deal its like a railroad bridge and abut 40 feet after that theres a sign, as were approaching the sign i see this white figure flying on the ground like 1-2 ft off the ground it goes across the road and lands on top of the sign and right as it lands we get next to the sign i look to the side and its a white owl staring directly at me and i mean it wasnt just facing my direction its head was looking at me, and as were driving past it i turn fast to look out the back and its head is following like me i guess thats what it felt like, so weird and so hard to explain this i dunno how open minded people are on this website, but its almost as if something has changed in me i see the world completely differently than i used to, its a very negative feeling and i have this anxious feeling that im waiting for something, i remember getting the same creepy feeling from the owl as i did from the teal disc. i know this is long but its cause this is the only time ive been able to express this to the public in a way that i actually feel can shed some light, the second part to this and the second ufo is not seen by me at all but by my cousin jims sister on the same night that we saw ours about 10 minutes after we see ours i called my sister to tell her about what i just witnissed and he called his when he calls his he starts freaking out and im like what? what??? and hes like she saw a fuckin ufo too and im like no she saw the disc thing? ask her and she said no but what she did see was what she thought was a shooting star but when she looked closer she said it wasnt going away and than she said thats not a star shape at all thats a triangle she said it kinda looked like the end of the pointer on the computer mouse thing just fly by than do the same type of dissapearing thing speeding up and just fading away into a wall type thing, i hadnt spoken with her for about a month and she posted something on facebook she said i cant shake this feeling i dunno what it is but i hate it, and i commented saying hey you alright? she replied saying yeh just have this anxious feeling and i said really? thats weird ive been feeling that too i said what do you think its from and she said i dunno i dont wanna say. and i said we need to talk now. so i called her up and said hey you home she said no ill be home in 10 come over tho so i came to her house, btw she's 20 and going to law school,ill call her jamie, i go to her house and she in her room with her brother and i come in and i havent told anyone about the deja vu ive been having yet except for my two friends i went to the hangover with, so were in her room and i said so like you got this feeling too? nd she said yeh its weird its like that feeling when your waiting for something in the mail and i said omg yehhhhhhhhhh me too like i m waiting for something special and she says yeh exactly and than i was like why didnt you wanna say nd shes like cause i dont want to buy in to believing it and actually thinking thats why, and i was like trust me you can tell me i need to know cause some weird shit has been happening to me lately, nd she says okay so she starts off and right away i get chills down my spine when shes says " so i keep getting this weird deja vu feeling" i stop her nd say wtf, explain it nowwwwww im gettin demanding now and she and i both can tell that we are now realizing that something weird is happening to us, it was like a connection nd she says yeh like i was with my friends the other night and they said something and i was all like woah deja vu hahah and she laughed and they laughed and than she looked with like a puzzled face and was like and than i was like wait stop talking and her friends got serious and was like what? why? she said its still happening. and there like what? the deja vu? and she said yes stop omg stop talking cause she was feeling that everything everyone said was just like it happened before than i told her what i just explained and she told me that she just basically have explained her life for the past month, i didnt talk about my lucid dreaming yet but i feel like this is getting to long and maybe to unbelievable now. i dunno know how this website works but id love to keep in contact with people cause something very strange is happening to me and im just trying to cope it cause this deja vu hurts my brain i dunno i cant keep having it happen its effecting me in a extremely negative manner. i will attach what i tryed to recreate of the ufo its not even close to exactly what i saw especially the light streak but hey i mean it at least puts a picture to it the "craft" in the video and colors are pretty close but like i said its not exact and the street its on is the actual street it occured on at 10:30 pm may 25th 2011 graduation night with no only one other vehicle on the road going in the opposite direction. thank you.
content.summary: A teal not blue or green but teal disc that appeared to be like a donut came from behind a wall and went lightspeed

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place at least 50 years ago.  i remember it well.I was walking my dog in the evening,  taking my time. when i looked up at the stars, two of them were moving.  one went staight up and disappeard in the
heavens.  the other made figure 8 in the sky and went in the direction of waupun from beaver dam.  the lights looked like stars but were moving and appeard to be high in the sky.  there was no sound.
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i are on my 19th floor apt smoking cigarettes, looking at downtown toronto. my bro tells me to look at this big bird, it was fling from south to north towards us,then it started acting strange, changing directions and start going up, my bro told me to grab camera.I went inside took my cam came out on balcony and i couldnt see it no more, i turned on my digi pointed towards  this object i saw and zoomed in to max, lucky my i found this object in camera screen and took three or four pics.
content.summary: I was on my balcony when i saw this object

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i smoking cigarets on my balcony, i live on 19 floor over looking downtown toronto and ontario lake. so we smoking and talking looking twords downtown, my brother tells me look at this big bird, it was coming from south to north, from downtown twords us, 
we are looking at this thing, it was kind of far but we could still see it , and then it started acting wiarde, changing directions very fast, we are like what a hell, than it started going up, my bro told me to grab camer. i went inside took my camera, came out on balcony but i couldn't see it no more. i turned my digi and zoomed in to max and lucky me i found this object in my camera screen, and took three or four pics.
content.summary: Looked like a big bird at beginning, but than it started changing directions very fast

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were at white castle in yonkers,ny about 1am in our vehicle at the drive thru. i noticed in front of me about mid point in the sky at first one large very bright stationary light in the sky. the light seemed to get brighter and at times dim out during our observation. approximately 10 minutes into the event we noticed a second object appear adjacent to the first one but to the left side stationary also and geting brighter while it hooverd in the sky like the first object. from where we were at looking forward a few hundred feet the hudson river would be approxiametly the area about which these objects may have been near. we noticed a helicopter in the immediate area with its lights on traveling directly towards the 2 objects that we were observing. as the helicopter drew near the objects began to dim or fade out but we could still see that they were still there. we were next up at the drive thru window and got our food then proceeded to make a left turn down south broadway were we then lost visual contact with the objects. my freind said that the first object we saw seemed to be perpindicular as if it were slightly elongated vertically in the sky. we got onto the saw mill river parkway and headed towards tarrytown ny but never saw the objects again that night.
content.summary: 2 very bright stationary lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was listening to a radio program at home that ended at midnight.  i was particularly interested because the dj was having a nervous breakdown on air.  i went outside with my boyfriend to get some fresh air and star gazing immediately after the program ended.  there were lots of shooting stars that night, so we were scanning the horizons. he pointed out the point of light in the north - north eastern horizon that was moving oddly.  the object gave off light, that changed color from white, blue to green, randomly.  it was close enough that i at first thought it was a helicopter - but a helicopter does not hover in that kind of pattern.  it was small enought to appear as a far away helicopter, but appeared to be hovering around the area of manton - about 30 miles to the north-north east, a little town in the foothills of the sierra nevadas.  we stood and watched the light for about 20 minutes.  it moved within an airspace about the size of a 50 cent piece from my vantage point.  it moved oddly, moving up rapidly, then slowly sinking down in an oval arc, would move up halfway of this path, then move to the left, to the right, quickly, or slowly, up, down, circular path, cross type path.  it hovered there, in this random pattern for the entire time we remained outside.  we also observed other points of light in the eastern and norther horizon that seemed to be doing the same things, about 5 other points of light, but these other points were so far away that it was difficult to determine how far they were, they seemed to be very high in the atmosphere.  the main point that caught my attention was obviously within the atmostphere, i'd estimate about 5,000 feet above the ground.  we watched and discussed ufo activity in the area, with curiosity, until i thoroughly had the creeps and went back inside.   

the next night, i returned at the same time with my boyfriend and my 13 year old daughter.  we all saw the same object, in the exact same space.  but this night the entire eastern horizon lit up randomly with a flash/strobe type light in about 3-5 minute intervals.  the light source seemed to be coming from the ground, and lit the sky up at horizon level.  we also noticed shooting star type streaks of light, but they were not moving downward as a meteor does, they moved parallel to the earths surface, very high up, outer atmosphere level.  we all felt very uneasy and returned inside, forgoing our planned walk. 

it should be mentioned that my daughter pointed out that, that sighting was in an area that would be normally traversed by commerical aircraft.  most evenings we watch multiple commerical flights passing in this space north - south, on the eastern horizon, about 50 miles east of i-5.  sometimes so many flights are moving at once that planes move at different altitudes from eachother to share the same air space.  we noted on the second night the commerical air traffic had moved to about 100 miles due west, about 30 miles west of i-5, we had to do a 180 from our normal plane viewing position to watch the flights travel.  we only saw one plane moving in the normal air traffic conduit, on the eastern horizon, a jet plane moving at high speeds from the south to the north.  it was obviously not a commercial craft - we watch them all the time, they do not move at that speed.  this was lit up like a jet and moved as fast as a jet.
content.summary: Starlike blinking point of light moving randomly within small space, seen from far distance

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home(west)along kynesville road after running an errand in marianna, a bright metalic green(orb or puck shaped)object appeared in the sky above me. it came from behind and went over the top of the car from east to west at roughly a 45 degree angle towards the ground. it was approximately 1000 ft above me. i was able to view the object for about seven seconds as it rapidy desended towards the ground. i pulled the car off the side of the road, and stuck my head out of the window in an attempt to either hear or see the impact. there were no other vehicles around at the time. there was no impact sound, nor any debris (that i could find) as one would have expected from the rapid decent of the object. i continued driving west along kynesville road searching along the road and in peoples yards for any sign of an impact sight or debris. i came to the junction of kynesville road and hwy 231 where i then pulled into a church parking lot and waited for the sounds of emergency vehicles responding to the event. there were none! 
in my twenty plus years in the emergency field (retired) i had been trained by the air force to evaluate and respond to emergencies. evaluating parameters and the details of an incident or accident are basic requirements. in my judgment an object traveling at that speed, and trajectory would most certainly have hit the ground.
content.summary: Metalic green object observed in jackson county, florida

content.detailedDescription: Over the last 5 years i have seen many strange avents1 from noiseless craft on the ground to bright to look directly at and never having a camera at hand. like clock work they allways seem to be around! on aug 28th at approx 2:30 am i was getting into bed like allways i look at the sky through my bedroom window and notised a bright object curious i grabbed my binoculars stedied them against the window jamb sett the focus and my jaw hit the floor woke up my wife and kids and probably for the first time didnt think i was crazy1 we could all see a bright saucer shaped craft with oval shaped windows i grabbed my nicon d90 and started shooting i uploaded everything the next day on my pc but got nothing i figured everything was lost until the next night when at 230 am it was back!!! so on the 30th i got a hold of my brother and borrowed a panasonic dvd camera and tripod so fron july 31st till aug 3rd i got some really good footage i think better then most my probblem is i am having a hard time uploading a dvd to a file to put on internet i think the country needs to see what i have i have contacted mufon newengland and left 2 messages but no reply. somebody please contact me i want to share        thank you  andy b
content.summary: From july 28th-aug3rd i whitnessed multiple craft of unknown origin over the city amazingly enough all air traffic from local airport was non exist

content.detailedDescription: Was out on back deck smoke break. was coming inside caught a view of red lights in the shape of a triangle. thought how is that plain flying like that? more like floating ,moving slowly, while keeping triangular shape. seemed to turn slightly, slowly, changing shape. then returning to triangle shape. seemed to descend a little, noticeable cloudy substance appeared underneath which cast a shadow of what seemed to be a mass. thought what new stuff is the air force testing these days? cool. then it seemed to ascend a little and move behind the tree line towards the soccer fields.
content.summary: Triangular with red lights at each point of triangular shape. emitted cloud which cast shadow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my house for work at approximately 12:15 am i never turned any outside lights on as i did not like people to see i was leaving. it was a dark night clear no moon. i stepped onto my back deck closed the door and all of a sudden it got darker. i naturaly looked up and directly  over my house coming from front to back where i was on the deck was a huge craft. it was not that high in the sky all black no sound whatsoever. it looked like a huge flying wing. i stood there as it flew at a very slow speed in a direct straight line to the east until it was out of sight.
being near ny and also near a small airport we have many planes flying over all the time. this was not high enough was enormus and made no sound
and no lights. i just wanted to see if anyone else reported this at that time.
content.summary: Huge black craft no sound no lights flying straight and slow and very low to ground

content.detailedDescription:
2010 new years eve about 6:00- 7:00 pm. i'm joe this was witnessed by my wife, daughter, mother, and me. my mother spend the day over our house. were not "big" new year party people just a bbq that day. my mother was leaving our home around 6:00pm. all of us walked my mom outside to her car as we always do to say good bye. my youngest son was running around the frontyard, as my wife, daughter, and i stood in driveway to wave bye to "grandma".As my mother was ready to get in her car my wife noticed three orange balls of light and said look at that. what is that? we all were staring at these balls of light for a while. at first they all stayed very still (as if it was a flares) then they all were moving back and forth, up and down. they were pretty far away but they all moved fast in a sporatic way. they seemed round and orangeish red color. it was strange cause we all thought it was not a ballon someone let go or anything eles but a big round ball. they would move jump around and then stop and hover a while. after about what seemed 5-10 mins two of them disappeared and the other shot up on a 45 degree path extreamly fast what looked tobe a half mile behind a large cloud. we knew we seen something unsure what it was......... here's the neat thing that happened. its been exactly 8 months later now. we watch the ufo stories when ever we catch them on tv. we watched yours and seen a similar story. i have aways been intrested in sightings since 12 yrs of age in my other report on this mufon site. i thought why not research what we seen and found other people the same night seen the exact same objects right here in st.Pete that night/day. they have video of what they seen. i've shown the videos to my wife, mom, and daughter we all were very amazed and i felt compelled to get a hold of these people to tell them our sighting. we have not contacted these people yet. below is what i found on youtube 

(links removed from statment and place in report field) 08/06/11 13:39 cms flg
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Three mostly orange balls in sky moving in every direction and hover

content.detailedDescription: I'll never forget this event when i was 12 yrs old. i was visting my cousin she lived a block away. my aunt would let me vist with my cousin and play in front yard often. this usauly happened in the evening as my mother worked late. it was 1979 around 8:30 pm and just after dusk. my cousin and i were playing tag in her front yard. we were tired from playing and layed down on her driveway. i noticed first and then pointed it out to my cousin. i had to point it out because it made no noise (none at all) and you had to stare/focus a while then the shape was very visible. we seen a huge boomarang shape. i said, do you see that shape in the dark sky and after a short pause she seen it too.It was not a jet this was weird.It was big, quiet, it should have been loud for its size. it was scary to us  (we just realy seen something strange)  her mom, my aunt, was inside the house. both of us did not want to leave in case it would disappear.We were both frozen in a type of shock staring at it. it did not last long. it seemed as dark as the sky and had very small lights in no pattern. was very close match for the night sky behind it. it blended very well. it moved east to west at a very low rate of speed and stayed the same height the whole time. we ran inside after we could no longer see it and told my aunt. i remember very clear we were very excided and just about hyperventilating explained what we both just seen.I was just about crying and said to my aunt we just seen a ufo. we really really seen something very strange. my aunt was very supportive and suggested to draw out what we seen. we made many drawings. i still have contact with my cousin and we both remember that night very clear. i've always been amazed when i see a program on tv and they show exactly what we seen that night. some of the reported sightings tell about a boomarang shape. my family today knows my story and the drawing i made of what i've seen in 1979 and its errie.
content.summary: Seen in sky from house driveway with another person

content.detailedDescription: Numerous emails have been sent to the webmaster at mufon asking why the link to access the latest 20 ufo sightings is not working and so far it is still directing us to fill out a sighting form. so many people rely on this website for current information as a tool to track et/ufo sightings and the fact that this issue has still not been addressed is disturbing to say the least. i hope that mufon is still a viable source of information going forward in the future. to lose this valuable website would be a terrible loss indeed. please post something on the main webpage to let us know what is going on please !
content.summary: Why is the link for the last 20 ufo sightings still broken?

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the sidewalk staring off into the stars, when suddenly out of the corner of my eye i saw a red light appear out of nowhere. i took my eyes off of the stars and stared at the object that had caught my attention (this was during nighttime by the way). it was a huge, black hovering disc spinning with a dome atop of the spinning disc and had a big red light in the center of the disc with three smaller ones on each side of the big red light. it hovered for about 10 seconds or less and flew extremely quickly down from the sky and disappeared into nothingness.
content.summary: I was sitting on the sidewalk and i notice a red light, that i soon found to be a huge hovering black disc with red lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching my dvr on ufo's and i want to look outside to see if i could see anything. it's kind of clouldy out, but see something i never seen before. well it looked like stars, but it was a perfect triagle and they were bright no other stars were out that i could see. this all happened around 1 28  in the morning. the all pulseaed the same all three stars or things.
content.summary: Big triangle in the sky

content.detailedDescription: 9/17/2009 at 720-25pm was out on balcony. it was dark outside. with two airports in view. from where i am. no clouds in the sky. completely clear. no aircraft in sight. have counted up to ten, at one time before. lit my cigarette. dropped my lighter. when bending down from sitting. to pick it up. there was something in my field of view seen. from the corner of my eye. on the way down. looked up. and seen what would be one of the most memorable moments of my life. i am on the fourth floor, when viewing this. it was hovering over, and back from, a very large school, in the city. it was huge. also very close. within a half mile. it did not move or make a sound. it was shaped like a long cylinder. with a bow at top. curving down along sides. a bright blue solid light running the length of the craft. blinding the rest of the craft with shadowed colors. although it seemed reflective. shiny and maybe metallic. a light shown down to the ground, from the craft. paused. then slowly moved across the top of the buildings towards my direction. it passes all the buildings. the light climbing up the side of my building. it eventually hit me in the face. at the same time disappearing. completely, silently, instantaneously. never heard any reports. never reported it myself. still can easily recall the date time and story. was wearing blue jeans and a haynes white t-shirt that night.
content.summary: The night i realized all my wildest dreams could be true and most likey are.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down i- 95 n,  the evening of august 5, headed for cape cod when i ( the driver) noticed the red lights in triangle formation with a couple of lights above and below out my window. at first i thought it was a plane but the triangle of lights made me look twice. i asked my husband if he could see it too, partly to check the viability of what i was seeing and partly to see if he found the sight unusual. we were both intrigued and so to satisfy our curiosity i pulled over on the shoulder as soon as i was able to, allowing us to safely watch them. they were a goldy, red-orange in color, and seemed to be moving paralell to us at first and then stopped to hover. they made a paralellagram with a small triangle in the center. the light on the leading point of the paralellegram was clearly the brightest. the lights began to flicker a bit like candles about to go out and then they faded paler and smaller. the central triangle disappeared first and then top lights and last the bottom lights, ending with light which had been brightest, at the bottom and front of the formation. we tried to videotape the ncident using my husband's cell phone camera but it was too dark and the highway traffic too disruptive to get any footage to speak of. we were pretty excited by the sighting (our first ufo experience) and talked about it for a while  afterwards.
content.summary: Reddish orange lights, a central triangle of lights and then 2-4
